text: # API Reference (v2.3) Rate limit: 300 requests/hour per API key. Error: - ERR003: Rate limit exceeded
# Authentication (v2.3) API keys expire after 60 days. Error Codes: - ERR001: Invalid API key
# Exporting Tasks (v2.3) Supported export formats: - CSV - JSON Error: - ERR004: Export failed
# Attachments (v2.3) Supported file types: - PDF - PNG - JPG Size limit: Each attachment must be 25MB or smaller. Error: - ERR002: Attachment too large

# TaskFlow Lite â€” Getting Started (v2.3) TaskFlow Lite is a lightweight task manager that helps you organize projects and tasks. Official Limits: - Max tasks per project: 500 - Attachments: up to 25MB each - API rate limit: 300 requests/hour per API key - API keys expire after 60 days
# Installation (v2.3) Available for Windows and macOS. Requires internet connection.
# Projects (v2.3) Each project supports up to 500 tasks. Error: - ERR005: Project task limit reached

# Troubleshooting ERR001: Invalid API key (may be expired after 60 days) ERR002: Attachment too large (must be 25MB or less) ERR003: Rate limit exceeded (300/hour) ERR005: Project task limit reached (500 tasks)
